perturbation.original_text:
In return for the exclusive appointment of Agency by MICOA to sell its professional liability products listed on the
&sbsp;attached Commission Schedule

in Nevada, Agency agrees not to sell any competing
professional liability products in Nevada, without the written
consent of MICOA. Provided that, if a particular risk has been
submitted to MICOA and MICOA has declined that risk, then
Agency may search appropriate markets for placement of that
risk, and may place that risk with another insurance company.
perturbation.changed_text:
In return for the exclusive appointment of Agency by MICOA to sell its professional liability products listed on the
&sbsp;attached Commission Schedule

in Nevada, Agency agrees not to sell any competing
professional liability products in Nevada, without the written
consent of MICOA. Agency is strictly prohibited from placing any risk with another insurance company, even if MICOA declines that risk.
perturbation.explanation: This change contradicts the original clause. Initially, the Agency could place a declined risk with another company. Now, they are prohibited, creating uncertainty about their options if MICOA declines a risk and potentially hindering their ability to serve clients.

perturbation.original_text:
This Agreement shall terminate, subject to any automatic
renewal or extension for one year as required by law, upon
either party giving at least one hundred twenty (120) days
advance written notice to the other, if not otherwise contrary
to applicable law or this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
This Agreement shall terminate, and there will be no automatic renewal or extension regardless of any law that requires it, upon
either party giving at least one hundred twenty (120) days
advance written notice to the other, if not otherwise contrary
to applicable law or this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: This edit directly contradicts the idea that law dictates the agreement's renewal/extension, which is stated in the beginning of the sentence. The changed section creates immediate contradiction with the original text, thus making the statement unclear and unenforceable.

perturbation.original_text: MICOA will share on a project basis development costs of all promotional materials and some advertising costs related to Nevada sales, provided that all such expenditures or budgets for them are approved by MICOA in writing in advance.
perturbation.changed_text: MICOA will not share on a project basis any development costs of promotional materials and no advertising costs will be covered that relate to Nevada sales, regardless if such expenditures or budgets for them are approved by MICOA in writing in advance.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states MICOA *will* share costs under certain conditions (approved budget). The changed text now states MICOA *will not* share costs regardless of approval, creating a direct conflict that obscures whether MICOA will contribute to these expenses.
